attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently most families receive child tax credits for their children depending on their income. All families receive child benefit regardless of their wealth. 
Child benefit should be scrapped and child tax credit could be increased to be made available more families except the rich who, most people would agree, shouldn't be relying on tax payers to help support their families.
This would reduce the burden on the benefit system including a reduction in administration costs.
